import { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { EyeIcon, EyeSlashIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import { useAuthStore } from '../stores/authStore'; import toast from 'react-hot-toast'; export default function RegisterPage() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const { register, error, clearError } = useAuthStore(); const [showPassword, setShowPassword] = useState(false); const [showConfirmPassword, setShowConfirmPassword] = useState(false); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ username: '', email: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '', }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); clearError(); if (formData.password !== formData.confirmPassword) { toast.error('Passwords do not match'); return; } const { confirmPassword, ...registerData } = formData; const success = await register(registerData); if (success) { toast.success('Registration successful!'); navigate('/dashboard'); } else { toast.error(error || 'Registration failed'); } }; return (
